channel.title: Can you try to answer all these questions?
channel.description:
How can i add custom shops How can i add a custom training ground How do i fix the glitch where after cutting a tree down or lighting a fire it stops the motion.
thanks!

item.title: Can you try to answer all these questions?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

droidmobile@yahoo.com:

Maybe thats why i ask for help besides you kids who want to be spoonfed. And its funny because i have a 317PI that is almost 100% everything. You’re jelly mhm.

ofcourse you do…

and i own jagex…

Read full topic

item.title: Can you try to answer all these questions?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“ladaswa, post:5, topic:437592”][quote author=droidmobile@yahoo.com link=topic=540297.msg3956592#msg3956592 date=1332807569]

How can i add custom shops
How can i add a custom training ground
How do i fix the glitch where after cutting a tree down or lighting a fire it stops the motion.

thanks!

Google.com
[/quote]

As you yourself, ask for help on moparscape, don’t post smart ass comments like this.[/quote]
Fuck you.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you try to answer all these questions?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“droidmobile@yahoo.com, post:9, topic:437592”][quote author=ladaswa link=topic=540297.msg3956629#msg3956629 date=1332811063]

How can i add custom shops
How can i add a custom training ground
How do i fix the glitch where after cutting a tree down or lighting a fire it stops the motion.

thanks!

Google.com

As you yourself, ask for help on moparscape, don’t post smart ass comments like this.
[/quote]
Moparscape help is for when you cannot find the solution that has already been released to the public LOL.

Maybe thats why i ask for help besides you kids who want to be spoonfed. And its funny because i have a 317PI that is almost 100% everything. You’re jelly mhm.[/quote]

I guarantee it’s not as stable as mines

item.title: Can you try to answer all these questions?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:7, topic:437592”][quote author=WanknessHD link=topic=540297.msg3956587#msg3956587 date=1332807345]
How can i add custom shops
How can i add a custom training ground
How do i fix the glitch where after cutting a tree down or lighting a fire it stops the motion.

thanks!
[/quote]

Custom shops? Just add a new case in your firstClickNpc linking to the shop, add the items in the CFG>
Spawn NPC’s…
What do you mean, how is that a glitch?[/quote]
And add secondclicknpc(? not sure) aswell for ones that actually have the trade option.

Read full topic
